Reviews.Title: “Hotel Gioberti Rome”
Reviews.Author: Elaine H
Reviews.Content: recently spent nights hotel hotel directly train station convenient short taxi ride major attractions depressing ceilings truly hideous orange striped walls lighting poor adequate size wise cup tea

Reviews.Title: “Room for improvement”
Reviews.Author: George D Posted by an Easytobook.com traveler
Reviews.Content: ideally located easy transfer termini rail station excellent access roma walking choice sensibly priced restaurants surrounding double glazed windows cut lot noise obviously city centres bustling dont expect tranquillity experienced poor service breakfast set own table mornings waited 40 minutes hot food option bacon eggs replenished morning bother enquire morning selection cold options hotel time convenience cleanliness star rating excessive 3 star

Reviews.Title: “Pleasant”
Reviews.Author: ClaudiaR2092
Reviews.Content: hotel alot nicer anticipated university sponsored trip weeks ago found staff nice sometimes bit rude bunch loud american college students rude housekeeper fourth floor sweet buon giorno morning nicemy 411 tiny cozy loved view street city front facing window liked location getting rome alot friends hotel sleep shower served purpose didnt breakfast simply legit cappuccino cornetto morning eat ham cheese wasnt missing overall loved trip probably book return rome soon internet cafe 20 feet corner street wifi issue

Reviews.Title: “Pleasantly suprised”
Reviews.Author: BakingQueenMtl
Reviews.Content: hotel low expectations pleasantly surprised stayed triple friends spacious spotless bathroom shower bit narrow safety box fridge notice day below desk arrived extremely warm time figure system eventually reviewers claimed beds hard true locationwise nicest step termini bus train metro totally walk colosseum breakfast pretty variety food drink friendly hotel staff offered prepare togo breakfast departure morning leaving breakfast change free wifi tv channels cnn international english hotel 4star honestly complaints

Reviews.Title: “NO SLEEP!!!”
Reviews.Author: Lagonda321
Reviews.Content: hotel clean 4 star opinion beds solid uncomfortable noise traffic outside wont allow sleep anyway staff reasonable exception manager shouting receptionist 25 euro surcharge appropriate simply calling taxi poor example hotelbb

Reviews.Title: “Good Location - Decent Hotel.”
Reviews.Author: pamAndRick
Reviews.Content: stayed 3 nights november clean front desk guys helpful addition sense humor comfortable shower stalls dropping floor wasnt bend pick aside reasonable stay breakfast buffet basic enjoyable usually sandwiches cold cuts rolls day saved money quality food mattresses firm comfortable usually complains walked lot rome firm mattress hotel block roma termini didnt lot walking found easy hike lot walking distance coliseum forum churches piazzas days rome joined tour usually tour bus taking basically enjoyed stay hotel return chance

Reviews.Content: hotel location lot sites located walking distance located block half roma termini station metro located coming fiumicino airport termini express fore warned train stops trains don’t elevator steps lower level located track instead stay stay terminal lower level exit building hill blocks busy streets left half block termini exit look mcdonalds street correct exit exit termini left walk street cross hotel located half block hotel clean windows closed leave widows traffic runs night truck traffic starting morning price range worst found size shower don’t drop soap can’t bend pick king size bed wifi extra 6 euros day don’t hard bed hotel bed sleeping floor front desk mixture people day shift alessandro buy head shoulders else speaks perfect english help answered questions located hotel advice eat hotel doesn’t restaurant breakfast worth extra cost photos restaurant close hotel free wifi food left leave hotel corner block street site close hotel left leave hotel blocks south basilica di santa maria maggiore grocery store hard street basilica east basement marked outside building lot items north leave hotel block left west walk five blocks fountain look north pizza della la de maria degli ideas genius detailed form

Reviews.Title: “it isn't a 4 star hotel”
Reviews.Author: william r
Reviews.Content: husband stayed 4 nights isnt 4 star hotel breakfast basic staf unhelpful bed hard rock hot water stopped day clean tv didnt days repair arent 4 star hotel positive location located termini station buses trains metro destination stay

Reviews.Title: “Basic hotel, Do not expect much”
Reviews.Author: Ayman Z
Reviews.Content: read reviews page staying hotel trip comments true hotel basic breakfast limited beds actually hard staff friendly rude shower actually limited space strange allowed key day arrival water plumping water solved quickly stay positive clean location perfect near termini transportation destination city tour buses stations spend night day tours rome expect

Reviews.Title: “Basic hotel”
Reviews.Author: JohnOF
Reviews.Content: stayed hotel wife mixed 32 people bb basis situated reasonably close underground station adequate clean tidy bathroom wc bidet shower adequate re size shower poor sink plug close fixed leaked water resulting balance water tap water plug ac created bit noise cooling whatsoever safe firm confortable beds usually lighting dreadful tv service poor hairdryer plus breakfast spacious packed breakfast provided days due start dreadful

Reviews.Title: “Not a 4-stars at all.”
Reviews.Author: alicelam2004
Reviews.Content: hotel 4stars rundown service reception desk varies depends shift guy serves morning mean rude 70s renovated shower hard bend pick stuff dropped location 5 mins rome termini station return hotel

Reviews.Title: “Neighborhood looked unsafe....”
Reviews.Author: eroom
Reviews.Content: hotel clean fairly comfortable location block train station location service told tour operator night walking walls coverd graffiti looked unsafe people location vatican main reason rome ammenties hotel limited extremely lobby reccommend hotel

Reviews.Title: “Good basic room close to Stazione Termini”
Reviews.Author: TravellingGal2
Reviews.Content: basic plentiful breakfast buffet helpful front desk staff arriving obvious smoked nonsmoking nonsmoking floor desk staff apologetic unfortunately nonsmoking booked wouldnt able move till day immediately hotel worker sent spray windows left dinner return found changed indeed helped remove smoke odor appreciated sincere efforts remedy situation hotel near train station neighborhood particularly pretty safe walking station near station advantageous pieces luggage haul biggest complaint extremely hard mattresses flat pillows sleep somewhat restless

Reviews.Title: “Nice hotel, great location”
Reviews.Author: clarant
Reviews.Content: stayed 3 nights weekend pleased hotel clean staff friendly helpful decent size weekend stay hotels location biggest selling opinion beside termini station easily bustrain transfers airports located 10 minute walk colloseum attractions short walk greatful staff day checked left bags reception flew evening returned collect bags found partners ipod unknown left accident waiting reception overall happy hotel staying
